Import Proc
Here I am importing some data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)

airline
```

Data wrangle
Here I am cleaning up the data

& Data Viz

```{r}

airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 5 & Y <= 20) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = Y, y = W) +
 geom_point(size = 1L, colour = "#0c4c8a") +
 theme_minimal()

```
